Text:
Just keep'em coming ...
good small rips with subs.
Big Thanks.

I agree with Aritra1911, i'd prefer if you can continue to release the individual episodes as soon as possible. That way i can keep watching the episodes as you release them.

Thank you very much for your work, i'll be checking TPB regularly for the rest of the episodes from you. Good video quality, small size and included subs, it's excellent.

I've been a piratebay user for many years, but never registered to comment until now. Your uploads of Arrested Development Season 4 are by FAR the BEST rips available in 720! Much smaller yet much higher quality than all the other ones. Keep up the great work, hopefully you'll crank out the entire season in this 720 format!

@ManImCool
I appreciate that you liked the uploads, and yes i'll upload the whole season.

@Aritra1911 @Hellboy86
You're welcome. And i'll upload the episodes separately.
